full_summary:
Ride on Lawnmowers with Attachments
=====================================

A Request for Proposal (RFP) titled Ride on Lawnmowers with Attachments is solicited by the Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) through the Defence Infrastructure Organization (DIO).

### Contract Information

* **Reference Number:** WS4025615780-Doc4256085951
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** October 12, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 2, 2023 at 14:00 hours Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** August 31, 2024

### Description of Goods and Services

The procurement is for the supply and delivery of three (3) ride-on lawn mowers with the following additional requirements:

* Snow plowing/blading attachments
* Weather enclosures
* Tire chains
* Maintenance items (filters, oil, etc.)
* Extended warranty repairs package

### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17706881?extsite=MTc3MDY4ODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** None

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Willy Zumbado Diaz
* **Email:** [willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number WS 4025615780 with a closing date of August 23, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offerors who submitted a bid on the previous solicitation. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the tender closing date at 14:00 hours EDT. All bids submitted after this time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Delivery Location

The required goods and services will be delivered to the Canadian Forces Base Suffield in Alberta, Canada. Canada is acting as an agent for the British Army Training Unit Suffield
